about_the_game:
"Phoenix Nirvana Rebirth" is an intricately crafted visual interactive novel that blends romance, suspense, and intertwined destinies. Set against the backdrop of a modern metropolis, it tells the story of Lu Qiqin, a young woman who was once a pampered heiress but lost her sight after a family tragedy. Facing numerous challenges in life, she embarks on a journey of self-discovery and redemption through her wisdom and courage.

After unexpectedly becoming pregnant, Lu Qiqin finds herself entangled in a web of conspiracy. Forced to flee from those who wish to exploit her unborn child for their own gain, including her foster father's son Wang Jian and caretaker Cui Hua, she encounters Xiao Ran during this terrifying and hopeless escape. Xiao Ran is a mysterious figure with considerable influence in business circles, playing a pivotal role in altering Lu Qiqin's fate.

As the plot unfolds, players follow Lu Qiqin's footsteps through a series of heart-stopping decision-making moments. Each choice impacts the storyline, leading to diverse endings. From fleeing hastily outside the hospital to hiding secretly within an abandoned amusement park; from subtle interactions with Xiao Ran to confronting psychological struggles with her past shadows – players will delve into the ups and downs of Lu Qiqin's inner world, witnessing how she gradually steps out of darkness towards light.

Furthermore, "Phoenix Nirvana Rebirth" places great emphasis on detailed depiction and emotional expression, aiming to present readers with a vivid and touching scene. Whether it be setting scenes or character dialogues, all have been meticulously designed to immerse every participant in this grand yet profoundly moving story.
